abstract: So far this decade, the inflation adjusted total return of the S.&P. 500 is worse than the 1930s, during the Great Depression.
snippet: So far this decade, the inflation adjusted total return of the S.&P. 500 is worse than the 1930s, during the Great Depression.
lead_paragraph: SINCE this decade began, the United States has fought two wars, gone through one recession, endured the collapse of a bubble in technology stocks and is living through a crisis in subprime mortgages that is making it difficult for many people and companies to borrow money.

headline.main: Not the Decade to Go Shopping With a Wallet Full of Stocks
headline.print_headline: Not the Decade To Go Shopping With a Wallet Full of Stocks
